entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Earlton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:59 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Earlton Airport 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -6.8°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -11.6°C
Wind: WNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
